preface.title: Preface
preface.para: This Guide explains how to install @virgo@ @webserv@ and the associated Eclipse tools and how a small application is developed and tested.
It is intended for Spring application programmers and assumes little or no understanding of OSGi or @virgo@ @webserv@.
Questions about @webserv@ and @sts@ (or this Guide) may be posted to the @webserv@ Community Forums (@webserv.community.forums.url@).
